summary: Improves the default female face textures with a more natural and realistic look. Compatible with default, UNP and CBBE body variants.
descriptionHtml:
Improves the default female face textures with a more natural and realistic look. Compatible with default, UNP and CBBE body variants.

This version is a complete rebuild. Images are mainly of Hroki (Markarth) with different ENBs and lighting situations. 
[color=green][b]
Installation[/b][/color]

To install, choose a body variant from the main files and unzip the file to the Skyrim Data folder or use Nexus Mod Manager (NMM). 

[color=green][b]Permissions[/b][/color]

See Permissions and Credits action button at the top of this page. Any customizations to all textures are not allowed without my permission.

[color=green][b]Credits[/b][/color]

Bethesda for the base femalehead model.
Credit to the Blender team for creating a great tool.
3d.sk for great textures.
author: dretmo

files.name: Luscious Faces Race Normals 1.8
files.changelogHtml:
Add an option for better UNP compatibility.
Better look on shaved head.
Minor improvements to ears.
Fix tanline between top of face and bald head.

files.name: Luscious Faces Female Eyebrows
files.changelogHtml:
Add an option for better UNP compatibility.
Better look on shaved head.
Minor improvements to ears.
Fix tanline between top of face and bald head.

files.name: Luscious Faces UNP
files.changelogHtml: Finished default, UNP and CBBE versions. Separated out race normal (msn) files and eyebrows into options. Main files now only have 4 texture files for the female face.

files.name: Luscious Faces CBBE
files.changelogHtml: Finished default, UNP and CBBE versions. Separated out race normal (msn) files and eyebrows into options. Main files now only have 4 texture files for the female face.
